    IntervalContractors.constant_contractor
    IntervalContractors.cos! — Function.
    cos!(X::IntervalBox)

    Contractor for cos. Takes an IntervalBox containing the x and y component intervals. Returns an IntervalBox contracted down to the set $y = \cos(x)$.

    IntervalContractors.cos_main — Function.

    Contractor for main branch of cos, from x = 0 to π.

    IntervalContractors.cos_rev — Function.
    cos_rev(y::Interval, x::Interval)

    Reverse function for cos:

    • find the subset of x such that $y = \cos(x)$ for the given y.
    IntervalContractors.cos_reverse

    IntervalContractors.sign_rev
    IntervalContractors.sin! — Function.
    sin!(X::IntervalBox)

    Contractor for sin. Takes an IntervalBox containing the x and y component intervals. Returns an IntervalBox contracted down to the set $y = \sin(x)$.

    IntervalContractors.sin_main — Function.

    Contractor for "main branch" of sin, from x = -π/2 to π/2.

    IntervalContractors.sin_rev — Function.
    sin_rev(y::Interval, x::Interval)

    Reverse function for sin:

    • find the subset of x such that $y = \sin(x)$ for the given y.
    IntervalContractors.sin_reverse
    IntervalContractors.sinh_rev — Function.

    Reverse function for sinh.

    Reverse sqr

    IntervalContractors.sqrt_rev — Function.

    Reverse square root

    IntervalContractors.square!
    IntervalContractors.square_neg
    IntervalContractors.square_pos — Function.

    Contractor for y = x^2, x >= 0

    IntervalContractors.symmetrise — Function.

    Symmetric part of a Contractor, via an involution op (i.e. such that inv(op) == op).

    IntervalContractors.tan!
    IntervalContractors.tan_main — Function.

    Contractor for "main branch" of tan, from x = -π/2 to π/2.

    IntervalContractors.tan_rev — Function.
    tan_rev(y::Interval, x::Interval)

    Reverse function for tan:

    • find the subset of x such that $y = \tan(x)$ for the given y.
    IntervalContractors.tanh_rev — Function.

    Reverse function for tanh.

    IntervalContractors.translate — Function.
    translate(α)

    Returns a function that shifts (translates) a 2D IntervalBox in x (the first coordinate).

    Translation of a Contractor C by α. Uses inv(op) ∘ C ∘ op
